statements: SELECT item_name, description, rarity_level FROM Inventory
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE rarity_level > 2
SELECT description, item_name FROM Inventory
SELECT item_name, rarity_level, description FROM Inventory WHERE rarity_level < 3
SELECT item_id, item_name, rarity_level FROM Inventory
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE rarity_level > 3 ORDER BY item_id ASC
SELECT item_name, description FROM Inventory WHERE item_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY rarity_level DESC
SELECT item_id, item_name, description FROM Inventory WHERE rarity_level < 2 AND item_name='Sword'
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE 1=1 AND rarity_level BETWEEN 1 AND 3 AND item_name!='Shield' ORDER BY item_id DESC
SELECT item_id, item_name, rarity_level FROM Inventory WHERE item_name='Potion' OR rarity_level = 5 ORDER BY rarity_level ASC, item_name DESC
SELECT * FROM items WHERE rarity_level > 3;
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM items WHERE item_id = 5;
SELECT item_id, item_name, rarity_level FROM items ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM items WHERE item_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT items.item_id, items.item_name, categories.category_name FROM items JOIN categories ON items.item_id = categories.item_id ORDER BY items.item_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM items;
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM items WHERE rarity_level > 3;
SELECT item_id, item_name, category_name FROM items INNER JOIN categories ON items.item_id = categories.item_id;
SELECT item_name, rarity_level FROM items ORDER BY rarity_level DESC, item_name ASC;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) AS total_items FROM items INNER JOIN categories ON items.item_id = categories.item_id GROUP BY category_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM items WHERE item_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, description FROM items WHERE rarity_level = 3;
SELECT item_id, item_name, rarity_level FROM items ORDER BY rarity_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM items WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT i.item_name, r.rarity_name FROM items i JOIN rarity_levels r ON i.rarity_level = r.rarity_id;
SELECT * FROM items WHERE rarity_level = 3 ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, description FROM items WHERE rarity_level > 1 AND description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY rarity_level ASC;
SELECT items.item_name, inventory.quantity FROM items JOIN inventory ON items.item_id = inventory.item_id WHERE inventory.quantity > 50;
SELECT items.item_id, items.item_name, rarity_levels.rarity_name FROM items JOIN rarity_levels ON items.rarity_level = rarity_levels.rarity_id;

SELECT item_name, description, rarity_levels.rarity_name FROM items LEFT JOIN rarity_levels ON items.rarity_level = rarity_levels.rarity_id WHERE rarity_levels.rarity_id IS NULL ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM items;
SELECT item_name, description FROM items WHERE rarity_level = 3;
SELECT item_name, rarity_level FROM items WHERE id = 10;
SELECT description FROM items WHERE id = 5 AND rarity_level > 2;
SELECT * FROM items WHERE rarity_level <= 2;
SELECT item_name, description FROM items WHERE rarity_level = 3;
SELECT item_name, rarity_name FROM items JOIN rarity_levels ON items.rarity_level = rarity_levels.rarity_id;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM items JOIN inventory ON items.id = inventory.item_id WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT item_name, description FROM items WHERE rarity_level BETWEEN 1 AND 2 ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, category_name FROM items JOIN item_categories ON items.id = item_categories.item_id;
SELECT * FROM items;
SELECT item_name, rarity_level FROM items WHERE rarity_level > 3;
SELECT item_name, description FROM items WHERE item_name LIKE '%sword%';
SELECT player_name, level FROM players WHERE level >= 50 ORDER BY level DESC;
SELECT player_name, item_name, quantity FROM players p INNER JOIN player_inventory pi ON p.player_id = pi.player_id INNER JOIN items i ON pi.item_id = i.item_id ORDER BY player_name, quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM items WHERE rarity_level > 3;
SELECT item_name, description FROM items WHERE item_id = 10;
SELECT player_name, item_name, quantity FROM players p JOIN player_inventory pi ON p.player_id = pi.player_id JOIN items i ON pi.item_id = i.item_id;
SELECT item_name, category_name FROM items i JOIN item_categories ic ON i.item_id = ic.item_id JOIN categories c ON ic.category_id = c.category_id;
SELECT * FROM items ORDER BY rarity_level DESC, item_name ASC;
